sentence.text: We show here that another member of the CLCA gene family, ion transmembrane transport, is expressed in mammary epithelial cells and is similarly downregulated in breast tumors and in breast cancer cell lines.
In breast cancer, cytokine production facilitates invasion of surrounding tissues and correlates closely with cancer metastasis and relapse.
Clinically, low expression of ion transmembrane transport signaled lower relapse-free survival in basal and luminal B breast cancers.
